Option.Name: Magic Buff Attack (Right and Left Handed)

swordArtsType.Wiki: Offset for TAE animation. 0 is a600. To pass to the behavior script to determine which swashbuckler

artsSpeedType.Wiki: Which cancellation timing do you see? 0: Normal (left hand attack) / 1: Early / 2: Slow

refStatus.Wiki: Which system of arts points to refer to

isRefRightArts.Wiki: When set to the arts of the left-handed weapon, the arts of the right-handed weapon are displayed in FE. Assumed to be used for weapon maneuvers etc.

isGrayoutLeftHand.Wiki: Whether to gray out when displaying the arts name of the left hand (one-handed)

isGrayoutRightHand.Wiki: Whether to gray out when displaying the arts name of the right hand (one-handed)

isGrayoutBothHand.Wiki: Whether to gray out when displaying the arts name of both hands

usePoint_L1.Wiki: Points to spend when putting out arts by L1

usePoint_L2.Wiki: Points to spend when putting out arts by L2

usePoint_R1.Wiki: Points to spend when putting out arts by R1

usePoint_R2.Wiki: Points to spend when putting out arts by R2

useMagicPoint_L1.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by L1

useMagicPoint_L2.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by L2

useMagicPoint_R1.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by R1

useMagicPoint_R2.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by R2

shieldIconType.Wiki: If you do not overwrite it, the icon will be displayed based on the swashbuckler ID of the weapon para.

Self.Wiki: All Action Ids for Weapon Arts
